sentences.sContent: White light can be split by a prism into a whole spectrum of wavelengths .
sentences.sContent_eng: White light can be split by a prism into a whole spectrum of wavelengths .
sentences.sCn: 白光可以用棱镜分解成具有各种波长的整个光谱。

sentences.sContent: This course reexamines every aspect of home life, from cooking to cabinet repair, through the prism of science.
sentences.sContent_eng: This course reexamines every aspect of home life, from cooking to cabinet repair, through the prism of science.
sentences.sCn: 本课程透过科学棱镜，重新检查家庭生活的每一个方面，从烹调到橱柜修理。

words.tran: 棱柱的，棱镜的；五光十色的，光彩夺目的

trans.tranOther: a transparent block of glass that breaks up white light into different colours
